<arguments>
<text>def is_palindrome(s):
    s = s.lower().replace(' ', '')
    return s == s[::-1]</text>
</arguments>
</tool_call>

<tool_call>
<name>magic_paste</name>
<arguments>
<text># WeatherLib

Simple Python library to fetch weather data.

## Installation
`pip install weatherlib`

## Usage
```python
import weatherlib
data = weatherlib.get_current("Moscow")
print(data.temp)
```</text>
</arguments>
</tool_call>
